original_title: First school term of 2023 to commence on Monday
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The first school term of 2023 in government and government-approved schools will commence on Monday (27).
Schools will remain open for the first term of 2023 until the 5th of April.
The Ministry of Education said school students will be given a holiday from the 5th to the 16th of April for the Sinhala and Tamil New Year.

Minister of Education Susil Premajayantha said school terms were extended in 2020 and 2021 to cover syllabuses, due to various disruptions to the education sector as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
The Education Minister further said students will be admitted to Grade 1, and to Grade 6 based on the results of the Scholarship Exam.
